Title: Verify ticket details are displayed for selected request
Description: Ensure that all relevant ticket details are displayed when a user selects a specific ticket from the tickets list.
Preconditions: User is logged into the HPNow portal and has at least one ticket available.
Test Steps: Navigate to the Tickets section from the left navigation menu.
Select a ticket from the list (e.g., RITM3093710).
Expected Result: Ticket details such as number, status, approval, due date, quantity, and stage are displayed in the main section.

Title: Verify workflow stages are displayed for the ticket
Description: Ensure that the workflow stages and their statuses are visible for the selected ticket.
Preconditions: User is viewing the details of a ticket.
Test Steps: Select a ticket from the list.
Expected Result: Workflow stages such as Request Approved, Waiting for Approval, Fulfillment, and Completed are displayed with their respective statuses.

Title: Verify Cancel button is displayed for open tickets
Description: Ensure that the Cancel button is visible for tickets that are in an open state.
Preconditions: User is viewing a ticket with status 'Open'.
Expected Result: A red Cancel button is displayed in the ticket details section.

Title: Verify activity stream displays ticket history
Description: Ensure that the activity stream on the right displays the ticket's history and user actions.
Preconditions: User is viewing the details of a ticket.
Test Steps: Select a ticket from the list.
Observe the activity stream on the right side.
Expected Result: Activity stream displays ticket creation and any user comments or actions.

Title: Verify user can add a comment in the activity stream
Description: Ensure that the user can type and send a message in the activity stream for the selected ticket.
Preconditions: User is viewing the details of a ticket.
Test Steps: Select a ticket from the list.
Type a message in the activity stream input box.
Expected Result: The new message appears in the activity stream timeline.

Title: Verify navigation path is displayed for ticket details
Description: Ensure that the navigation path (breadcrumb) is visible at the top of the ticket details page.
Preconditions: User is viewing the details of a ticket.
Test Steps: Select a ticket from the list.
Expected Result: Navigation path (e.g., Home > Tickets > RITM3093710) is displayed at the top of the page.
